description: Check if there is a wetland code for the row. All wetland codes have the first character so check it exists
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Validate character exists from the 4 character wetland code. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
Validate character exists from the 4 character wetland code. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the second character.
Validate character exists from the 4 character wetland code. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the third character.
Validate character exists from the 4 character wetland code. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the fourth character.
